member.name: T:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.ReceiveCallBack
member.param: The source of thec current message
Boolen: True if message is addressed to the node
Received Signal Strength. Range and units of values depends on specific radio.
A indicator of the link quality calculated by radio layer. Range of values depends on specific radio.

member.name: T:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.CSMA
member.remarks: By default, uses Radio #1 on the device. For the eMote.NOW 1.0, that is the 802.15.4 radio.

member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.CSMA.Initialize(Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.MacConfiguration,Samraksh.SPOT.Net.ReceiveCallBack)
member.returns: The radio status after initialization: Success, Fail, Ready, Busy
member.remarks: By default, uses Radio #1 on the device. For the eMote.NOW 1.0, that is the 802.15.4 radio.

member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.CSMA.Send(System.UInt16,System.Byte[],System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.param: The address of the receiver. Use (UInt16)Addresses.BROADCAST for broadcast (65535).
Byte array containing the message to be sent.
The first byte in the array to send. Normally 0 for first byte.
The number of bytes to send.

member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.CSMA.GetAddress
member.summary: Get the address of the device.
member.remarks: This is the address by which the device is known to the rest of the world.

member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Mac.CSMA.SetAddress(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Set the address of the device.
member.remarks: This is the address by which the device is known to the rest of the world. A return value of false can occur if another layer locks the address and prevents changes.

member.summary: Get the ID of this CSMA instance.

member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Net.Radio.Radio_802_15_4.SendTimeStamped(System.Byte[],System.UInt16,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Load and send a message, with radio layer time stamping.
member.returns: The result of the method: E_RadioInit, E_RadioSync, E_RadioConfig, E_MacInit, E_MacConfig, E_MacSendError, E_MacBufferFull, S_Success
member.remarks: The offset for the timestamp in the packet is specified by TimeStampOffset member of the RadioConfiguration structure passed as parameter during radio module initialization.
